thread.title: Digital Press Inc. Appoints New Vice President
thread.title_full: Digital Press Inc. Appoints New Vice President | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: Digital Press Inc. Appoints New Vice President
text: (MENAFN Press) (MENAFN - MENAFN Press) Chris McDonough is Digital Press''s new Vice President based in Daytona Beach. DAYTONA BEACH Fla. - Sept. 25 2015 - PRLog -- Digital Press Inc. is pleased to announce that Chris McDonough has been promoted to Vice President. Chris had been previously working for Digital Press Inc. in the Jacksonville market. Chris''s area of responsibility is client acquisition sales and social media marketing.Chris was born in Volusia County and attended Seabreeze High School. He graduated with a Bachelor of Science Degree in Corporate Finance from the University of North Florida''s Coggin College of Business. He has held several positions with Digital Press and their sister company ColorCards2Go over the past eight years. He recently moved back to Ormond Beach.In November of 1999 Brochure Displays Inc. expanded into a full service printing business. Digital Press Inc. was established to meet the demand for higher quality products at more affordable pricing. The company has a complete full-service graphic design department and a variety of offset and digital presses to meet customer''s needs. Their equipment allows them to meet the challenges afforded to the printing industry by the diverse quality requirements of today''s customer.In addition to the traditional print services Digital Press offers all types of tradeshow displays banners signs promotional items and logo apparel through their sister company ColorCards2Go Inc. The Brochure Displays Inc. division distributes brochures to tourist attractions hotels and businesses from New Smyrna Beach up the east coast to just south of the South Carolina line. They can be reached via phone at 386-271-5500 or 386-271-6500 or online at www.digitalpressonline.com www.brochuredisplays.com or www.colorcards2go.com. ContactDigital Press Inc.***brochuredisplays.com--- End ---
